a0.speaker: Sakuya:
a0.dialogue: I feel something familiar about this storm...

a1.speaker: Sakuya:
a1.dialogue: It feels so similar to when my knives began to rebel...

a2.dialogue: You experienced something that involves knives reveling?

a3.speaker: Kaori:
a3.dialogue: Indeed it is the work of a youth with a heart of gold... Not me, but the Ouki!

a4.speaker: Sakuya:
a4.dialogue: Oh, so you have some big shot who manipulates you?

a5.speaker: Sakuya:
a5.dialogue: I guess the person would be in any way related to those cross-cladded people I met some time ago.

a6.speaker: Kaori:
a6.dialogue: The Narukami Ouki did not manipulate me in any way. I am simply just serving under her service.

a7.speaker: Kaori:
a7.dialogue: And why are you holding so much animosity towards the hosts of the Lord?

a8.speaker: Kaori:
a8.dialogue: If someone has such feelings towards them, they must be agents of the Scarlet Devil.

a9.speaker: Sakuya:
a9.dialogue: Oh ho, I guess you want to decimate my honor after all.

a10.speaker: Sakuya:
a10.dialogue: Lady Remilia will not be pleased when some twerp decided to challenge her authority and powers.

a11.speaker: Kaori:
a11.dialogue: These words are the sign of you feigning alliance with the Scarlet Devil and her forces.

a12.speaker: Sakuya:
a12.dialogue: Oh ho, so now you are approaching me?

a13.speaker: Kaori:
a13.dialogue: You better be burning in the Netherworld with the netherrack, O those who take the appearance of a maid!
